name: .360 File Extension
summary: Learn about .360 files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Image file used by 360desktop, a program that enables a panoramic desktop environment; stores a 360 degree panoramic wallpaper image; can be comprised of multiple digital photos that have been stitched together.

content: When the 360desktop environment is enabled, it expands the width of the desktop by the width of the panoramic image. You can fluidly scroll the entire width of the desktop as well as smoothly wrap around when at the ends of the desktop.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
